title: Serious Team Recruitment
body:
This team is intended to be a serious team.
This includes setting an intended time for the team to get on and play a few matches every week. If you consistently cannot make the scrims without a valid reason, you will be cut. This however can be given leniency.
 
Requirements:
 - Your elo DOESN'T matter
 - You need to have played League for at least a year, this is so any rough or newer players won't need to learn the game while playing seriously.
 - You need to have skype

Considering, of course, people DO have lives, and therefore sometimes cannot make it to the designated time slot in which was arranged to play, there will be open slots for substitution.

The roles that are currently open are:
 - Top
 - Jungler
 - ADC
 - Support
 - Substitution (you can play a variety of roles and are willing to)

I intend to take the role of MID. We do need substitutions as apart of this team, as not everyone I suspect will be able to play in the designated time every week. The substitutes will be able to play with us an equal amount, if online.

The application is below:

IGN: 
Desired role:
Substitution roles if applicable (in order of preference):
Do you have skype?:
Have you played for at least a year?:
Age:
How long have you played League for?:
Bio:

Once you're done applying, add me on league. 
IGN: PvPRealm

Thanks for applying to be apart of this ranked team! If drafted, I look forward to playing with you.

Also, if you don't mind, upvote this please so I get more views, thankyou :)

replies.body:
IGN: Tiz Arrior

Have you played for at least a year?:YA!
Age:25
How long have you played League for?: Roughly 2-3 years. 
Bio: Available pretty much all day,

Hi PvPRealm! 

Here is my application Information.

IGN: Crosstowndonkey
Desired Role: ADC/MID/SUPPORT/TOP (in order of preference)
Sub Roles: MID/ADC/SUPPORT/TOP
Have I played for at least a year?: Yes i started in season 2.
Age: 21
How long have I played League of Legends for?: As above, Since season 2.
Bio: I ended season 4 in Diamond IV after 4 months of intense 18 games a day, paid coaching and practice games with high elo players. I am hard working, devoted to the game and I have a vast knowledge of the game which I have used by doing free coaching on http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=48618.

Here are some un-edited videos of my game-play in diamond Ranked solo queue. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgAbVPa2_Q_IRSu5zikMw1g/videos

Thanks for the opportunity!

Hi there PvP Realm! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team

A1rSnark, thanks for applying. You were designated as the main ADC for this team. There is only 1 problem when attempting to add you to the team however, you are apart of too many teams. In order to join this team, you need to leave another. If this is a problem, contact me either in game or reply to this comment. If this isn't a problem, contact me. Either way, contact me with your response. Thanks. I look forward to playing with you.

Alright, but before your friend is even considered, a description of him as well is needed. Add me in game :)

Would you be willing to take on a first time analyst? i know its not something you would really of thought of but if you got a team together i would love to pull apart your games and help develop strategies and team comps
Sure mate, if you want to do that with us, you're more than welcome to. Add me in game for further discussion.
